result: **Bug found**: The `click.termui.unstyle()` function fails to properly remove bare escape characters and incomplete ANSI sequences. When text containing `\x1b` is styled and then unstyled, the escape character remains in the output, violating the round-trip property `unstyle(style(text)) == text`. Created bug report: `bug_report_click_termui_unstyle_2025-08-18_05-55_f6hb.md`
